PART_SENSOR_SONAR_DESCRIPTION: If an object is within the range of the sonar, this sensor will output a signal depending on the distance to that object.
PART_SENSOR_SONAR_PIN_DESCRIPTION: If an object is within range, this pin will output a signal ranging from <high> when it is directly in front of the sensor and <low> when it is at its maximum distance. When no object is within range, the output will be <low>.
